body_html:
@peterjc123 My build is failed. But I successfully got Aten.dll and shm.dll under D:\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\bin.
But it seems that I need to update VS.

body:
@peterjc123 My build is failed. But I successfully got Aten.dll and shm.dll under `D:\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\bin`.
But it seems that I need to update VS.
